A can of sausages. Jammie picked one up and just when Carey was about to take a bite the doorbell rang.

"Who can that be? I did't expect anyone?" Jammie said a bit grumpy since she hated it to be disturbed while doing something.

"I'll go." Mandy mumbled.

She walked over to the door and opened it. A long woman with blond curly hair was standing for the door.She was average sized and wore white clothes that seemed pretty expensive. She smiled with perfect white teeth.

"Not natural white." Mandy mumbled so soft no one else heard it.

"Well hello Jammie. Nice to see you again."

"I'm Mandy!" She said snappish.

Not that it was unusual. People mixed them up all the time. Even Carey and their parents sometimes had trouble keeping them apart. No one liked it when someone mistaken one for the other but still no one of them tried to do something about it.

"I'm so sorry. Mandy. You look so much like your sister. How are you?"

"Am I suppose to know you?" Mandy asked with a confused look on her face.

The woman walked in and said: "Well we did met sometime. but you probably don't remember. Back then you two were just thumb suckling toddlers and Carey was't even born yet. I'm an old friend from your mother. Did't she told you I would visit? Well I'm not surprised. That's really your mother. She would even forget her boobs if they were't attached to her body."

"Yeah." Carey must admit. "That sounds like or mom."

Their mom suddenly walked in the room. She saw the woman and a wide smile spread around her face.

"Susan how are you. Now I remember. You told me you would coming. It's so nice to see you again."

Susan and their mother went to the other room and the three kids were starting with their favorite game again. Feed, feed and eat.

"What a nice daughters you have. Especially Carey. She seemed to like to eat."

"Yeah I want her to fatten up. I would like it if she and her sisters got fatter. I wanted to have fat kids."

"Still the same. Even in kindergarten you always seemed attracted to fat people. I never understood why. So you like to fatten your daughters. It's not my problem. If you want to do it go ahead. But are't you worried about their health?"

"Of course. But they can become really fat before they get serious health risks. If it comes to that I'll stop. I swear."

"You know I might have something for you. You maybe have heard that obesity kills most people every year. Except maybe smoking. Did you hear that?"

Sabine (name from the mother of the children) saw every talk show or documentary about obesity or weight problems.

"I heard that."

"Well I work in a laboratory and guess what we came up with."

With a: "Taadaa." She got a small white bottle out of her bag.

"This is a special stuff we invented. It should let people be able to gain without getting any health risks. Can you imagine that. People are able to become very fat without having to worry about dieing because of heart problems and other stuff."

"So it's a vaccine? It cures people."

"Eh.... no. It's only able to prevent them from happening. But it's a big step. We tested it on a lot of animals and did a lot of tests and we're pretty sure it works perfectly but... well we have't tested it on a human. Not yet."

"Wait do you want to use my daughter like a test rat?" Sabina asked.

"Take it easy Sabine. We tested the stuff so many times. There's just a tiny chance that there's a small side effect on human but we doubt that. But we need to know for sure. You said you want to fatten up your daughters. Well If they take this stuff you can fatten them up without needing to worry about any heath risks. For as far if we knew they can gain a as much weight if they can without getting any health risks. However at a certain point he or she still get's immobile of course."

Sabine looked at the bottle. This was all she could ever dreamed of. But still using her daughter like a test person. She was't sure. But if Susan was right there was only a very tiny chance something could go wrong. The only thing she needed to do was fatten up Carey. She would love doing that.

"You know this stuff will become pretty expensive. I know hundreds of people will buy it anyway since they're overweight, at free will or not... it does't matter... they will buy it so they won't die. Where once she was a scrawny girl, her cherubic belly now hang over her skirt by several inches while her blubber pushed up against her dress top, revealing a nice fat roll of flesh. Ashley's thighs were now beginning to scrape together now, and her increased girth made her chubby face even cuter.

Carol, Eve, and Ashley were sitting in the car as they drove into the downtown plaza of the city. "How big will she get?" Eve asked with excitement as she looked to the sides of the windows. "She will be a fleshy ball of a sister who you can play with every day." Carol grinned widely, though her expression was cut off after the thought of her husband entered her mind. "Your dad is none too excited, though. But he must be honest: Ashley looks so much cuter being so fat!"

Behind, Ashley snored as the bloated girl's heavy breakfast digested within her large gut. Her eyes were closed as the trio continued to drive towards a medical compound.
1423111221122121211221121112.title: To Gain or not to Gain is the Question

142312222221.content:
Marie was a big girl for her age, due to her mother never letting up on feeding her with exceptions to potty brakes and when her mother was asleep while she was awake, as her mother found a way to feed her while she was asleep. However, Marie was very smart for a toddler, or rather waddler considering her mass. She could fool a teenager if she put her mind to it, well except her older brother, but that's because he's also very smart. Marie got the hang of waddling on her second attempt despite having a very full belly at the time.

Her older brother, Lenard, had more-or-less created a business all by himself at the age of 15 using his smarts to create a service that gives a better idea on what one needs to help their child... Not that his mother would use it. The only reason why he doesn't try to get Marie away from their mother is because it would cause the whole "the Cobbler's Children have no shoes" dilemma, and that despite everything that their mother does to Marie, she likes being fat (even though she dislikes being stuffed every day). Even so, he stays away from his home due to the amount of work it takes to keep the service running smoothly.

Their father left while their mother was still pregnant with Marie, just before Lenard created his business. This caused their mother to snap, stuffing Marie so she would get so fat that she won't leave her just like both males in her life had.

Marie doesn't mind having a big belly, but sometimes wished all the food went into her rear instead of her belly since it's allot easier for her to get up off her bum then her tum. Her own belly drooped to her knees on the very rare occasion that she was truly hungry, and her rear was getting so big that her mother gave up putting her in diapers, letting her run around naked instead. Her legs and thighs are large enough to brush against each other even when waddling in the widest stance she had.

Currently Marie is awake and her mother is...
142312222221.title: Less toddle more waddle

1423122222211.content:
Luckily for Marie her mother was asleep, a rare occurrence as her mother had tenacity and could, on occasion, stay awake for two whole days and only sleep for 6 hours afterwards.

Unfortunately that was not the case right now, but Marie figured that she had 2 hours of safety til her mother awoke, thus she waddled as fast as she could towards a box that was next to a large pile of stuffed animals. Doing the best she could at climbing up the pile of animals due to her massive size, she looked into the box.

It was full of books that her older brother left for her on the rare occasion that he came home, they were mostly books for young kids to help them learn to read. However, at the bottom of the pile was just a dictionary, which was the end goal of box, to have her learn all (or rather, most of, this dictionary was censored by Lenard before he gave it to her) the words in the dictionary so then she could both read more advanced books and get the hang of speaking. Picking up one of the books Marie then plopped down on her massive rear and began reading. Her mother didn't mind her reading books despite her age, and would think nothing of it when she wakes up and comes to her room.

By the time Marie got done reading her book...

Marie's mother giggled while she saw her daughter jiggle and bounce with each step she took, lifting her up into a chair which could hardly contain all that weight without spilling over the edge.
"Time for your first breakfast, sweetie. I have plenty more for you, so eat as much as you can. Wouldn't want to overwhelm the table with food." Her mother said.
Marie, who was already quite hungry, decided to begin eating, chowing down on everything she could get her stubby, flabby hands on.
Her mother watched happily, glad she raised such a good glutton, "Yes, eat up. Don't leave a single scrap left."
